source.1a97d17b:
for i in [i for i in df.columns]:
    if df[i].nunique()>=12:
        Q1 = df[i].quantile(0.25)
        Q3 = df[i].quantile(0.75)
        IQR = Q3 - Q1
        df = df[df[i] <= (Q3+(1.5*IQR))]
        df = df[df[i] >= (Q1-(1.5*IQR))]
df = df.reset_index(drop=True)
display(df.head())

source.f11f4bc9:
1.  Gender : Male / Female
2.  Height : Number (cm)
3.  Weight : Number (Kg)
4.  Index :

    >0 - Extremely Weak

    >1 - Weak

    >2 - Normal

    >3 - Overweight

    >4 - Obesity
    
    >5 - Extreme Obesity
